Paragraph: Side effects of hysterosalpingography with Dimer - X , Hexabrix , Vasurix polyvidone and Endografine in 142 consecutive patients , receiving one of the four tested media were evaluated from replies to postal questionnaires .

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |

The other mentioned entities do not clearly refer to diseases.

Hysterosalpingography is a medical procedure, not a disease.

Dimer - X, Hexabrix, Vasurix polyvidone, and Endografine are brands or names of medical products, not diseases.
